item.title: Breaking the Silos: Seeing Problems as Opportunities
item.description:
Are you mainly deterred or attracted to risk? Do risks at work keep you up at night, or are you excited to jump into them the next working day?

In times of rapid and unexpected change, there are unexpected opportunities and possibilities, if you can see the upside of risk instead of the potential downside.

A radical open-minded, curious and courageous mindset is needed to learn and thrive in this environment. If you are really willing to challenge yourself and change your own mindset, this is the mini-conference for you.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Psychological Safety in Tech
item.description: Join us for an insightful exploration into Psychological Safety at our upcoming mini-conference. Designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of this critical topic, the event will feature an engaging opening keynote and three enlightening case studies presented by experts and managers who have navigated the intricacies of fostering a psychologically safe environment within the tech industry.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Inclusion in Tech
item.description: At this meetup, we focus on inclusion in tech companies. Discover new strategies to foster diversity, equity and belonging in your organisation, hear from industry experts, and connect with like-minded individuals from the community.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Neurodiversity in Tech
item.description: Our first meetup focuses on Neurodiversity (ADHD, ASD, intellectual giftedness, etc.) in tech, featuring four live keynote speakers.
